column4: i used this http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=688872 to create a live cd but i have a problem that when i put it on usb flash disk  it works but i cant change the gdm theme and when i burn it i got stuck with gdm and i cant log in plz help me i need this soon as a review  of ubuntu in my town a
why do you need to change the gdm theme? obviously you won't be able to write to read-only media
i mean i think something corrupted with gdm it self
